Skill.label: 4 cwdt, vortex, purifying flame, arcane surge

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Replica Alpha's Howl - 3c Storm Secret - 2c Self-Fulfilling prophecy - 2c Agnerod South - 1c Doryani's Invitation - 1c
Vessel of Vinktar - 5c Calamitous Visions - 30c Inpulsa - 60c - 70c - 300c Replica Fragile Bloom - 20c
---------
mini : 3+2+2*2+1 = 10c then add : calamitous > inpulsa > links > vinktar (cant use without inpulsa self shock)
